author: @GSMArenaOfficial

comment_id: "Upgrading from an IPhone XR. I do not regret going for this smaller phone. It is the perfect mini device and the performance and battery life is excellent. I can‚Äôt fault it in anyway
comment_text: it feels so good in the hand too and I can finally use my device without having to play hand gymnastics. Texting with one hand is great. I can fit it into my pockets now with ease. Over-all a powerful mini phone. I do hope apple continues these mini phones because I will never go back to a bigger one."
author: @jessicawaddingham7327

comment_id: "I upgraded from the 2020 SE and holy shit. I was lucky to get 3-4 hours of screen on time with the SE. Now I easily get through a day with 6.5-8 hours of screen on time. The design feels like the 5s which was my favorite design of all time. Screen size is nice. Battery
comment_text: performance and design are all 10/10. Unfortunate we might not get a 14 mini."
author: @JumpFloater4

comment_id: "Had the 13 mini for a week now and its just amazing. A brick in the pocket is not ideal for me so this model is the perfect size for me. Smaller battery but it is still a very good one. Love it!"
